```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Question1

### 1.Load the penguins dataset
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

### 2.Describe the penguins dataset
describe the dataset from several aspects, including the head of the dataframe using head() function, the size of the dataframe using nrow() & ncol() and also the mean flipper length using mean() function.
```{r}
head(penguins)
num_rows = nrow(penguins)
num_cols = ncol(penguins)
cat("The dataset has", num_rows, "rows and", num_cols, "columns.\n")
```
